name: Spooky Light
description:
Spooky Light Summary

Spooky Light is a horror-humor game where you play as an unknown figure in a mysterious dark universe where creatures are attracted to light.

You're trapped in a dark universe where light attracts terrible monsters. Armed with only a light-stick and your reflexes, will you make it out alive?

Made for #StencylGameJam 16. The game was made fairly quickly, in about 2 days. There will be bugs and glitches! Do notify me under the comments if you found any!

---

How To Play?
  1. Arrow keys for movement.
  2. Z key to turn on/off lights.

Can you reach the end of the tunnel?
